page.title: 08The Dairy
page.content: My dad works at the Dairy(Express Dairies). I think he works hard because one week he works 5pm-6am, another week he works 6am-6pm. My dad's job at the Dairy is a{foreman. He helps people who are not getting on very well and he tells people what to do and he does people's jobs when they are ill. The{milk}comes from different farms in the area. They collect the milk by driving a{lorry}to the{farms}and pumping it into the back of the lorry and then take it back to the Dairy. They make the milk into lots of things, such as -{cheese, yoghurt}and {butter.}They skim some milk and make it into{longlife}milk. The workers there each get twelve cartons of milk a week.
